name: Sprint01 Final Build IT201 James Lupo
name_original: Sprint01 Final Build IT201 James Lupo
description:
For my final project for Sprint 01 the game I am submitting has a way to change the shape of the primitives you are spawning and changing the color of the primitives. You could also add gravity to the primitives when you spawn them and either have them removed from the world with a timed destroy that will destroy the shapes after 3 seconds or a destroy all button that will destroy all the shapes immediately. 

You changed the shape by clicking the dropdown in the top left and picking which shape you would like to spawn and then holding or pressing RMB to  spawn them.

You change the color of the shapes you are spawning by holding LMB and dragging the sliders of either Red, Green, or Blue in the bottom left and then hold/click RMB to spawn the shapes with different colors.

You destroy all of the shapes at once if the timed destroy option is ticked off and you click LMB on the "Destroy All" button while the shapes are spawned.

You add gravity to the shapes by picking which shape you would like to spawn with gravity and then hold or press Middle Mouse Button to spawn the shapes with gravity.
